pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple-Direction Logrank Test // Implemented are the one-sided and two-sided multiple-direction logrank test for two-sample right censored data. In addition to the statistics p-values are calculated: 1. For the one-sided testing problem one p-value based on a wild bootstrap approach is determined. 2. In the two-sided case one p-value based on a chi-squared approximation and a second p-values based on a permutation approach are calculated. Ditzhaus, M. and Friedrich, S. (2018) arXiv:1807.05504. Ditzhaus, M. and Pauly, M. (2018) arXiv:1808.05627.
